parts.text:
```json
{
"application": "Slurm",
"details": {
"job_name": "factorialFunctionSimple",
"output_file": "logs/factorialFunctionSimple.%j.out",
"error_file": "logs/factorialFunctionSimple.%j.err",
"mail_type": "begin",
"mail_user": "lhw150030@utdallas.edu",
"nodes": 1,
"mpi_tasks": 1,
"runtime": "00:01:00",
"language": "Julia",
"script": "ex_02_factorial_function_simple.jl"
}
}
```

This script uses the **Slurm** workload manager to run a **Julia** script named "ex_02_factorial_function_simple.jl".  It requests a single node and a single MPI task with a runtime of one minute.  The script will generate output and error logs in the "logs" directory.  The script also sends a notification email when the job starts.
